[center]Shadow Networks is working to create new server, [b]SHADOW EMPIRE[/b] (We currently only have one site coder and one game coder, which is why we are recruiting)
For this to become a truly great server we need more coders, which will be rewarded with ingame gold mod status, and forum moderators aswell. [/center]
[b](TO JOIN THE SN TEAM ADD MAZE ON MSN AT [i][u]REAPER23@HOTMAIL.COM[/u][/i])[/b]
[b]Spots availible:[/b]
[b][u]Game Coders: [/b][/u] [i]Maze [/i] (Currently [b]3[/b] availible)
